properties.entry: SELECT * FROM CATEGORY ORDER BY CATEGORY_CD

SELECT ITEM_NO, ITEM_NM, TO_CHAR(ITEM_PRICE, 'FM9,999,999') ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_INFO,ITEM_DATE, CATEGORY_CD, ITEM_STATUS_CD, MEMBER_NO, READ_COUNT, b.CATEGORY_NM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISH WHERE ITEM_NO = ?) WISH FROM ITEM join category b using(CATEGORY_CD) WHERE ITEM_NO = ?
SELECT IMG_NM, IMG_PATH, IMG_LEVEL FROM ITEM_IMG WHERE ITEM_NO = ?
